page.title: 05Headmaster at Bartley Middle
page.content: {Mr King }has been Headmaster at { {Bartley Middle School}since the changeover from Secondary to Middle School in 1974. He was appointed to organize the whole school from scratch and so the whole school is set out on lines of his choosing. Mr King decided on a semi-open plan system with all classes leading onto a central corridor, no doors on any of the classrooms. He has adopted the policy of appointing specialist teachers. They now have specialists in Computers, Music, Science and Remedial Studies. He has never found it necessary to expel any pupil and only administers corporal punishment for very serious crimes. The Headmaster has no power to fire a member of staff. He has the help of a full time secretary for the administration of the School
